text: Dear Father is an 2022 Indian Gujarati movie. It is based on the Gujarati play of the same name. The movie was directed by Umang Vyas. It was written by Vivek Bele, Uttam Gada, and Aditya Rawal. The movie stars Paresh Rawal, Manasi Parekh, and Chetan Dhanani. It released on March 4, 2022. ==Plot== After a man falls from his balcony, a police investigation focuses on the man's son and daughter-in-law. ==Cast== *Paresh Rawal as Manubhai Joshi, Ajay's elderly father *Manasi Parekh as Alka Joshi, a professor in mathematics and Ajay's wife and Manubhai's daughter-in-law *Chetan Dhanani as Ajay Joshi, a lawyer and Alka's husband and Manubhai's son ==References== Category:2022 movies Category:2020s Indian movies
title: Dear Father
